channel.title: Error. Help
channel.description:
[code]Compiling..... client.java:29667: missing method body, or declare abstract public boolean ApplyDead(); ^ client.java:29706: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmou nt); ^ client.java:29706: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmou nt); ^ client.java:29706: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem, getItemSlot(keepItem), keepItemAmou nt); ^ client.java:29707: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAm ount2); ^ client.java:29707: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAm ount2); ^ client.java:29707: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem2, getItemSlot(keepItem2), keepItemAm ount2); ^ client.java:29708: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAm ount3); ^ client.java:29708: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAm ount3); ^ client.java:29708: illegal forward reference deleteItem(keepItem3, getItemSlot(keepItem3), keepItemAm ount3); ^ client.java:29723: illegal forward reference if (keepItem != 0) ^ client.java:29724: illegal forward reference addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount); ^ client.java:29724: illegal forward reference addItem(keepItem, keepItemAmount); ^ client.java:29725: illegal forward reference if (keepItem2 != 0) ^ client.java:29726: illegal forward reference addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2); ^ client.java:29726: illegal forward reference addItem(keepItem2, keepItemAmount2); ^ client.java:29727: illegal forward reference if (keepItem3 != 0) ^ client.java:29728: illegal forward reference addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3); ^ client.java:29728: illegal forward reference addItem(keepItem3, keepItemAmount3); ^ client.java:29733: return outside method return true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Note: server.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 20 errors Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: :confused: I really don't get these errors at all. i'mn usually good at solving errors but this is confusing me allot. please please please help =)
Nsf

item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:

item.title: Error. Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

‘missing method body, or declare abstract’

Change

method1(); {

To

method1() {

As for the other error, you’re probably trying to invoke method A in the declaration of itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Error. Help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“nsfpure, post:3, topic:396106”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=493285.msg3606542#msg3606542 date=1306174398]
Illegal forward reference" means that you are trying to use a variable before it is defined.
[/quote]

How would I fix this ?[/quote]by adding the boolean in the proper area.

Read full topic

item.description:

Press any key to continue . . .

I really don’t get these errors at all. i’mn usually good at solving errors but this is confusing me allot. please please please help =)
